pompom template of the desired size and make a pompom mine is tiny 2 5 cm 1 in in diameter here s a great demo of how to make pompoms without a pompom maker fix it to the top of your hat weave in the blocking weave in the remaining ends soak the hat in lukewarm water gently squeeze and roll in a towel to remove most of the water leave flat to dry 3
